resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ivan. 

I’m the developer of this wonderful app. 

Maybe, it’s too simple, but so far, so good. 

I promise you, my next app will do more things. 

The goal of writing this quite a long text is to observe how it’s displayed on the scroll view. 

A month ago I visited Córdoba. It’s an amazing city! 

Recently I went to Lisbon, and that city is incredible as well! 

If everything goes well, in two weeks I’ll travel to Palencia. I guess Palencia is a quieter place, with almost no tourists, although, perhaps, I’m mistaken. 

A trip is always a surprise, so let’s see. Anyway, it should be a great time. 

Thanks. Bye!
